typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	test-folder as string,
	test-file as string,
	path-to-test-folder as string,
	path-to-example as string,
	example-folder as string,
	example-file as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'json',
	fileSystem: ($path-to-test-folder),
	folderPath: ($test-folder),
	fileName: ($test-file),
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> 
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~>
